item.description:
I'd like to get a group of at least 6 and as many as possible together to socialize between games and get messy with the explosion of paint balls. Based on early signups (I know, this is posted way in advance), I'll talk to the business and see what sort of group rates we can get.

Later in the season I'd like to do an outdoor session, but April weather may be a bit unpredictable still.

Estimated cost will be $32 at most for admission and rental of gun, mask, paint and co2 cartridges. Again, if we get enough people, I can get group rates and reduce this cost. Depending on how long we intend to play, additional paint will likely be necessary. (200 rounds doesn't last long as I recall)
item.name: Indoor Paintball
